title: Confess, Fletch
overview: The roguishly charming and endlessly troublesome Fletch becomes the prime suspect in a murder case while searching for a stolen art collection. The only way to prove his innocence? Find out which of the long list of suspects is the culprit - from the eccentric art dealer and a missing playboy to a crazy neighbor and Fletchâ€™s Italian girlfriend. Crime, in fact, has never been this disorganized.
